## getCurrentUserSubscriptions() function

Retrieves existing Stripe subscriptions for the currently signed in user from the database.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getCurrentUserSubscriptions(payments: StripePayments, options?: GetSubscriptionsOptions): Promise<Subscription[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  payments | [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) | A valid [StripePayments](./firestore-stripe-payments.stripepayments.md) object. |
|  options | [GetSubscriptionsOptions](./firestore-stripe-payments.getsubscriptionsoptions.md) | A set of options to customize the behavior. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Subscription](./firestore-stripe-payments.subscription.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

Resolves with an array of Stripe subscriptions. May be empty.
